sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for operating the UV–Visible Spectrophotometer for quantitative analysis.
procedure: Switch ON the instrument and allow sufficient warm-up time.
Select the required wavelength or wavelength range.
Prepare blank and sample solutions as per experiment.
Place the blank solution in the cuvette holder and set baseline.
Record the readings for further calculations.
sections.precautions: Use clean cuvettes. Avoid fingerprints on optical surfaces. Handle samples carefully.
